CommandGive.label: Give Command
CommandGive.tooltip: Command that users will use when they want to transfer points.

CommandGiveCooldown.label: Give Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandGiveCooldown.tooltip: How long the Give command should go on cooldown for.

CommandAdd.label: Add Command
CommandAdd.tooltip: Command that (typically) moderators will use when they want to add points.

CommandAddCooldown.label: Add Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandAddCooldown.tooltip: How long the Add command should go on cooldown for.

CommandRemove.label: Remove Command
CommandRemove.tooltip: Command that (typically) moderators will use when they want to remove points.

CommandRemoveCooldown.label: Remove Cooldown (seconds)
CommandRemoveCooldown.tooltip: How long the Remove command should go on cooldown for.

CommandSet.label: Set Command
CommandSet.tooltip: Command that (typically) moderators will use when they want to set points value to certain amount.

CommandSetCooldown.label: Set Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandSetCooldown.tooltip: How long the Set command should go on cooldown for.

CommandGetTax.label: Get Tax Command
CommandGetTax.tooltip: Command that users will use when they want to to retrieve current tax percent.

CommandGetTaxCooldown.label: Get Tax Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandGetTaxCooldown.tooltip: How long the Get Tax command should go on cooldown for.

ParameterAll.label: Parameter All
ParameterAll.tooltip: Command parameter that allow to use all points amount to transfer.

GiveTaxPercent.label: Tax Percent For Give Command
GiveTaxPercent.tooltip: Tax percent that will use take into account when users transfer points.

MinGiveAmount.label: Minimum Give Command Amount
MinGiveAmount.tooltip: Minimum amount of points to transfer.

MaxGiveAmount.label: Maximum Give Command Amount
MaxGiveAmount.tooltip: Maximum amount of points to transfer.

AllowToTransferToYourself.label: Allow To Transfer To Yourself
AllowToTransferToYourself.tooltip: Allow users to transfer to yourself.

PermissionOnGiveGetTax.label: Permission On Give And Get Tax Commands
PermissionOnGiveGetTax.tooltip: Who is able to use the commands to give points and get tax percent.

PermissionInfoOnGiveGetTax.label: Info for Give And Get Tax Commands
PermissionInfoOnGiveGetTax.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission on Give And Get Tax Commands.

PermissionOnAddRemoveSet.label: Permission On Add, Remove and Set Commands
PermissionOnAddRemoveSet.tooltip: Who is able to use the commands to add, remove or set points.

PermissionInfoOnAddRemoveSet.label: Info For Add, Remove and Set Commands
PermissionInfoOnAddRemoveSet.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission on Add, Remove and Set Commands.

PermissionDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: You have to be a {0} to use {1} command!
PermissionDeniedMessage.label: Permission Denied Message
PermissionDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on failed permission check. 0 — required permission, 1 — command.

AllowToAddRemoveSetForOtherWithSamePermi.label: Allow Operations Without Target Permission Check
AllowToAddRemoveSetForOtherWithSamePermi.tooltip: Allow users to perform operations despite on target permissions.

OperationDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: cannot use {0} command on {1} which has the same or higher permission!
OperationDeniedMessage.label: Operation Denied Message
OperationDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on invalid command call for target which has the same or higher permission. 0 — command, 1 — target.

InvalidCommandCallMessage.label: Invalid Command Call Message
InvalidCommandCallMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a command with invalid parameters. 0 — command, 1 — command usage example.

SuccessfulTransferMessage.label: Transfer Success Message
SuccessfulTransferMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful transfer of points. 0 — user, 1 — amount, 2 — points name, 3 — target, 4 — tax amount.

SuccessfulAddingMessage.label: Adding Points Success Message
SuccessfulAddingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful adding of points. 0 — user, 1 — amount, 2 — points name, 3 — target.

SuccessfulRemovingMessage.label: Removing Points Success Message
SuccessfulRemovingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful removing of points. 0 — user, 1 — amount, 2 — points name, 3 — target.

SuccessfulSettingMessage.label: Setting Points Success Message
SuccessfulSettingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful setting of points. 0 — user, 1 — amount, 2 — points name, 3 — target.

NotEnoughFundsToTransferMessage.value: Sorry {0}, you don't have enough {1} (you have: {2}, required: {3}).
NotEnoughFundsToTransferMessage.label: Not Enough Funds To Transfer Message
NotEnoughFundsToTransferMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesn't have enough funds to transfer. 0 — user, 1 — points name.

NotEnoughFundsToRemoveMessage.value: Sorry {0}, {1} doesn't have enough {2} ({1} has: {3}, required: {4}).
NotEnoughFundsToRemoveMessage.label: Not Enough Funds To Remove Message
NotEnoughFundsToRemoveMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesn't have enough funds to remove. 0 — user, 1 — target, 2 — points name.

InvalidAmountMessage.value: Sorry {0}, {1} isn't a valid amount. Please, choose integral amount in range: {2}
InvalidAmountMessage.label: Invalid Amount Message
InvalidAmountMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specify invalid amount to transfer. 0 — user, 1 — specified amount, 2 — valid amount range.

NoTargetMessage.value: Sorry {0}, but you didn't say who to send the {1} to.
NoTargetMessage.label: No Target Message
NoTargetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesn't specify a target. 0 — user, 1 — points name.

InvalidTargetMessage.label: Invalid Target Message
InvalidTargetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies an invalid target. 0 — user, 1 — target.

DeniedTransferToYourselfMessage.value: Sorry {0}, but you cannot transfer {1} to yourself.
DeniedTransferToYourselfMessage.label: Transfer To Yourself Message
DeniedTransferToYourselfMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to transfer to yourself. 0 — user, 1 — points name.

CurrentTaxPercentMessage.label: Current Tax Percent Message
CurrentTaxPercentMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user retrieves current tax percent. 0 — current tax percent.

TimeRemainingMessage.value: Command {0} is on cooldown. Time remaining: {1} (seconds).
TimeRemainingMessage.label: Time Remaining Message
TimeRemainingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to call command which is on cooldown now. 0 — command which is on cooldown, 1 — time remaining.

AllowLoggingToFile.label: Allow Logging To File
AllowLoggingToFile.tooltip: Allow script to log to file in script folder.
